website_summaries.verdict: A durable press for making patties or stuffed burgers up to a half pound in size.
pros: Makes 4-inch regular or stuffed burger patties
cons: Sometimes hamburgers stick a little on the bottom of the press

website_summaries.verdict: When you want to try your hand at creating some fun, gourmet stuffed burgers, this is the press you need.
pros: Base of the press has screw holes at the edges, so you can affix it to a surface and speed up the burger making process
Allows creation of hamburgers of up to one-half pound in size
Press is perfectly shaped for stuffed burgers, but it also works for regular patties
cons: All-plastic design, so it may not last

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I've been attempting stuffed burgers for awhile now ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I've been attempting stuffed burgers for awhile now and they never come out right. My first attempt with the stuffed burger press was a success. Fresh avacado slice, cheddar, worceseshire sauce and some chorizo. I'll be using this until I wear it out. I thought it needed better directions in the packaging, but there are YouTube videos made by other happy customers that demonstrate it quite nicely. I'm a costumer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: O...M....G......amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best burgers ever! Ok, I'm a burger snob and I always get asked to make burgers for work get togethers...well...I tried my hand at stuffed burgers and even my husband said he was firing himself from ever making hamburgers again. He said if I ever wanted hamburgers again I would have to make them...so yummy and so freakin easy to use. The sky is the limit on what you want to put in it. Raspberries for the tartness...why not...jalapenos for some spice diarrhea later...go ahead! Want to get your stubborn kid to take their meds....bam! done! I'll never go back to non-stuffed hamburgers again...they are just too plain for me now...I'm moved on to spicier things in life now.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Easiest hamburger press to clean.  Takes no time to leave it as good as new
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to unboxing the Grillaholics Stuffed Burger Press more than a month later. I like it. I found it super easy to clean. It made very nicely shaped stuff burgers. My only concern was the longevity of the top part of the press and the removable insert that creates the cavity. It's held in place by fragile plastic so I don't expect it will last for long. I would like to see this hamburger made from metal with a better locking mechanism for the top half and cavity insert. Otherwise, I would have given it five stars. But I was most impressed with how simple it is to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: SnugglesTheHusky

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best stuffed burgers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this burger press on a recommendation from a good friend. After I received it, my husband took control and started looking at the instructions, viewed a You Tube video on how to make stuffed burgers and went to town. We have had stuffed burgers twice this week and they were fantastic. I wish I would have known about this a long time ago. There are great recipes on the web for all different kinds of stuffed burgers. I can't wait for my husband to try another recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Round, perfectly stuffed burger
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most is being able to smush some ground beef into the bottom, add some cheese and peppers, add more ground beef and end up with a perfectly formed round burger ready to grill. I spray it with PAM first and the burger easily comes out. For me the only con, hence 4 stars, is that the burger is thicker than I prefer so I compress it with a spatula and it still retains it’s round shape. If you like your burger thicker then it would be ready to grill right out of the press. This is a neat little implement.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lawhon

customer_reviews.title: It’s great in one way... not the other
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little gadget but it isn’t without its flaws. Flaw - the attachment to make patties the normal way (not stuffed) has no grippers in it allowing you to grip it to remove when you want to make a “stuffed bigger”. This will be handy for making regular patties but when we tried the the “stuff” I found getting the top to secure on the hamburger isn’t as easy as they make it sound.
customer_reviews.author: IloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger
customer_reviews.text: These are okay, but if you plan to stuff them, you'll need to use very little meat. It says it will make 1/2 pound burgers, but we were barely able to make 1/4 pound burgers when stuffing them. Also when stuffing them, it's very difficult to get both sides to stay together. They are also difficult to remove, so I would recommend spraying them with butter or putting a coat of oil inside before you use. If you found this review helpful, please click the ‘Helpful’ button below. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mick04u

customer_reviews.title: Solved our stuffed burger problems.
customer_reviews.text: Love to grill burgers and my wife loves to stuff our veal/lamb/pork/beef burgers with all sorts of cheeses and veggies. Problem has been that sometimes the burgers crumble on the grill and don't look so appetizing when served. No more. The burger press burgers are loaded up but look just perfect when plated or laid on a big roll. And I don't have to worry about them on the grill. You can really load them up -- and they cook perfectly. Simple but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: great product but
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a 5 star, but no instructions. I figured it out but with anything short of a nail, instructions should be included..... positives: makes a larger burger than another I bought the area for filling was nice sized. (even if the shredded cheese all melted out). you can make regular burgers also that are decent (man sized) negatives: no instructions the bottom circle was loose, better to have it made solid and use wax paper. (this was a minor thing) Final thought, pinching the sides will close the top to the bottom filled part of the stuffed burger.
customer_reviews.author: bruce welsch

customer_reviews.title: Great burger with the help of a great tool.
customer_reviews.text: received and used it yesterday. used 8 oz of 80/20 ground beef. i think i'll reduce to 6 oz. seemed a bit large. easy to use and i must say one the best burgers i have ever had. filled with mozzarella cheese, bacon and jalapenos. infused with garlic evo and then a light coating prior to placing on the grill. easy to use and clean up in the dishwasher makes it very convenient. well made from solid material. i am still waiting on the email to get the book. i do not know if there is a lag. I'll be calling later today if nothing arrives in my inbox.
customer_reviews.author: Richieb52

customer_reviews.title: Become a Grill Burger Master
customer_reviews.text: A great way to easily make the prefect hamburger, especially the stuffed ones. Simple to use and easy to clean. You can try any stuffing that you like, cheese, bacon, peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes, relish and any combination of these and others. It produces a fat burger that doesn't fall apart on the grill when you flip it and it tastes great if you know what you are doing on the grill. Buy this and you won't regret it. It isn't cheap but then things that work and last usually aren't.
customer_reviews.author: waynjer64

customer_reviews.title: Great design and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a metal burger press that was difficult to use and hard to get apart to clean. I wanted something simpler and easier. This fits the bill. It's designed nicely. I especially like that the bottom piece is not fixed to the sides. This makes it very easy to push the burger out. The top piece that make the burger well (indentation) works nicely. I found that if you rub the top piece with a little oil, it prevents the burger from sticking to the top. This only occurs on the first one or two burgers until there is enough grease from the hamburger to prevent sticking. Overall, I am very pleased with this burger press.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Reiter

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as one of my boyfriends 'fun gifts' for valentines ... well it turns out that he LOVES it and uses it all the time! Might be one of the most practical gifts I've given him. He's the cook in the household and has told me that it's made making burgers so much easier for him. The burgers cook more uniformly than when he rolled them by hand - and I can attest that they are delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Ziggybaby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool, I make burgers with all kinds of goodness inside. It is important to note that your burger is most likely going to spring a leak, this is ok. At first I was freaking out as I saw some of my cheese and goodies spill out, but it is part of the process and you don't lose much at all. All in all with this thing I can make the most delicious burgers ever. If you are on a Keto style diet this is perfect, fill that burger with all kinds of fattening stuff and laugh all the way to the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Makes The Best Burgers Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this burger press!!! It has made me famous with my summer BBQ dinner guests!!! I surprise my friends by putting all their favorite burger toppings INSIDE their burgers. It's so much fun and quite a surprise!!! I LOVE it so much that I ordered one for each of my BBQing brothers for their birthdays!!! Did I mention that I LOVE this product??? LOL If you love to BBQ and love burgers and love them with toppings, BUY.THIS.NOW. Have recommended it to friends and they have purchased and love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I worked in the restaurant business for 40 years. I worked with many different types of hamburger presses. This press is easy to use, yet enables you to prepare burgers quickly and prepare them in different ways for different people. The patties hold together much better then hand puttied burgers, yet doe not destroy the produce like excess handling can. The burgers are juicy and uniform size. I have made patties from 1/4 lb, 1/3 lb and 1/2 lb all are easy to grill.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a hassle...offset by wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed...no pun intended. The meat sticks to everything. Tried a light coating of olive oil. Didn’t help. The only way I was able to achieve any semblance of a patty was to use wax paper....on every surface, on every step. Too much hassle in my opinion. Update, 10 June 2018 Grillahooics reached out to me the day after I posted my review. Had some suggestions to make my experience better. They worked and I couldn’t be happier with the results. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use.To clean it, it's a snap. Everything comes apart for easy cleaning and reassembly. It's easy to make the burgers and they come out in a nice patty for grilling or to be made in a pan on the stove. Now, I only gave it a 3 star rating because after cooking the burger, there is a certain amount of Cooking Shrinkage so the meat is smaller than the bun. The diameter of the form should be bigger to compensate for that.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It's not a perfect product, but it's great for what you're paying. The meat does stick a little bit to the top piece of the press (I put plastic wrap in the bottom piece), but a second or two or gentle tugging on the side get's the patty to pop right off. I made 5 turkey burgers this morning with various spices, and they grilled up just fine. All of them stayed in tight shapes. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Rule

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Made some good burgers with this.. Fairly simple to use. Was expecting something a little higher quality. Hard plastic but I wouldn't say it's high quality for the price. Only used one time and going to spray on some nonstick spray next time and hopefully make things easier. I used 2 lb's of burger to make 7 patties.
customer_reviews.author: R. Howland

customer_reviews.title: Slick burger press
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for a perfect pocket in the burger. Did not receive the link to the recipe eBook but a quick note to support at Grillaholics sent the pdf. The burgers are big nearly 1/2 pound and need to be grilled slowly for about 11 minutes a side. I am looking forward to treating friends at summer BBQs. Dishwasher safe and BPA free.
customer_reviews.author: W M Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly shaped, perfectly stuffed burgers taste better!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Not only do your burgers come out perfectly formed, they somehow even taste better! And you can even use it to make the perfect dimple in the inside of your burger and stuff the burger with cheese, and that is the best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Walls

customer_reviews.title: this press is excellent, but for making stuffed burgers
customer_reviews.text: This burger press is not the same as the video describes. It is not as large as it shows on the video, and the press portion fits snug in the pase portion. Design does not offer the ability to create a pocket in the burger as shown in the video. For creating basic burgers, this press is excellent, but for making stuffed burgers, it is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Reslems

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very rarely do I respond with any sort of feedback. However, I feel that your product warrants feedback. I received my Grillaholics Burger Press and was able to use it on Sunday. I have nothing but good things to say about this product. It made the perfect sized burgers, and was extremely simple to use. I've used other burger presses in the past, and they always seem cheaply made and never make a decent pocket for the stuffing to go into. You have a wonderful product and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea Well Developed
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES this burger press! She actually enjoys grilling and when I purchased this for her, she was ecstatic! Worked really well with a perfectly shaped (She likes that, too) burger and cheese melted in the middle. Simple instructions and the cookbook and videos available really help. Will use frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Melfi

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works well, seems very long-lasting.
customer_reviews.text: The Press is a sturdy product, and has already stood up to me REALLY pressing down hard numerous times. It's easy to use and clean - BUT make sure you go to Grillaholics website and look at their instructions for the Press. By NOT doing that initially, I made my first attempts more difficult for myself! Even so, it worked great and I've had some great looking AND tasting burgers for the family and friends - made almost 60 burgers already - in about a month - and it was EASY!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: For Years I Tried Unsuccessfully To Stuff Burgers By Hand.  This Has Solved My Problem!
customer_reviews.text: After years of unsuccessfully trying to stuff my own hamburgers, I decided to try this out. I wish I had thought about buying something like this long ago. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and it makes perfect stuffed burgers. I let my imagination run wild when thinking of things to stuff burgers with...even Korean kimchi. I couldn't be more delighted with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love our burger press!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always making burgers just to have them fall apart on the grill. My burger press has fixed this plus has allowed my to mix it up and include some fun additions in my burger. Ended up purchasing one for my sister because I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works really great. I only use it just to patty out burgers but works great. only thing i wasnt to happy with is the handle kinda rubbed my knuckle sore after patty'n out a dozen burgers as i have large hands. not a big issue and most may not have that issue and wouldnt be a issue just doing a few burgers at a time. Still very happy with the purchase and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Scott Merkle

customer_reviews.title: This is a no-brainer purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My burger patties I shaped by hand always fell apart, even when they were meat patties with nothing added. The Press allows me to quickly form patties with or without any bonus material added to the center. I love stuffing my patties knowing they will cook in one piece. I regret not ordering this when I first started looking at it. Verynice that it is dishwasher safe. This is a no-brainer purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't instruction so it took me a while to find the fourth piece to it. Works great, simple, easy to clean. However, if you're like me and you're buying it as a gift to someone who is trying to cook perfect burgers.. You might want to explain that plain burgers do not need to fill up the WHOLE press. Great buy though!
customer_reviews.author: Punnkinnuggit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Burgers
customer_reviews.text: I use to have to go to a certain Philadelphia based bar to get a stuffed burger. Not anymore, I can make them at home. It is the little things in life that make it all worthwhile. The stuffed burger press makes perfect burgers and perfect stuffed burgers too! A quality product that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my second round of burgers the first try was a disaster. Here are a few tips: 1. keep the meat cool ( don't try it on the deck in the sun ) 2. Make all your burger tops first. 3. Have fun and don't be in a rush.... like I was on the first round of burgers : )
customer_reviews.author: Dragonass

customer_reviews.title: 75 stars out of 5. Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this thing 75 stars out of 5 I would. OMG. Seriously amazing. Just made some venison burgers stuffed with onion and 5 Italian cheeses. Ridiculous product. Super strong. Super simple.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: cheap, neat, useful
customer_reviews.text: my wife always had me make patties for grilling, because I have bigger hands. This is a cheap, but fun and useful little tool to have around for grilling days. Now two people can prep patties!
customer_reviews.author: omgerd yay buying stuff

customer_reviews.title: Barbecue mata
customer_reviews.text: Best barbecue mat I ever had, it is so easy to do everything now, from burgers to vegetables, sea food etc without haven the issues of food getting under the burners. I do recommend this product, yo will Be very happy
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Press on!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one fantastic burger press! Its easy to use, cleans easy and burgers come out all the same size. I've had other burger presses, but they were nothing like this one. A simple easy to use device that makes stuffed burgers an easy task! Kudos to the folks that came up with this idea!
customer_reviews.author: hueypilot

customer_reviews.title: Best Burgers Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've resisted burger presses before because of bad reviews but took a chance on this one because I am so happy with the Grillaholics Grill Mats. It is truly EXCELLENT. Burgers don't stick, it is easy to use and easy to clean and makes a perfect burger every time in combination of the Grillaholics Grill Mat! It is a pleasure to do business with one that truly cares about their customers and their satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: This burger press is absolutely amazing! I love me some stuffed burgers with bacon and cheese and boy oh boy did it live up to the hype of stuffing burgers! Super easy to use and clean, only negative connotation I'd give it is that I wish the press with wider to make a bigger burger
customer_reviews.author: A. Jarvela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to pop the perfectly formed stuffed burgers out to cook. Makes meal prep so fast and simple. May need to buy another for assembly line work when pre making or freezing meals for later. Best gift he’s used over and over again and loves coming up with new stuffed burgers and I don’t have to cook best part of all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Add what you want inside your burger
customer_reviews.text: You want to make burgers your way. You can add anything inside the burger as you want. I love adding mushrooms or spinach inside my burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Zero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Burgers Every Time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband and he’s made some amazingly delicious stuffed burgers. Box doesn’t really come with instructions but there’s only 3 pieces so he figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Weaver1

customer_reviews.title: Burger Lovers you need this
customer_reviews.text: I came across this item when I was ordering a new gas grill. I went ahead and ordered after watching the short video. I also ordered the Grillaholics Grill Mats at the same time. If you or your family and friends like burgers, you need to add this item to your grill tools. It is a fantastic item and I am surprised no one came up with the idea before. The first time I used it, I stuffed the burgers with onions, mushrooms and cheese. Let me tell you, the burgers were an absolute hit and my family has already given me a list of items they want me to stuff with the next time. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Law

customer_reviews.title: Not the best burger press
customer_reviews.text: This burger press is decent enough but i have used better ones. The plastic is rigid and seems to last a while. It has the option to make a dimple in it for stuffing which is nice. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Work's great
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out the proper amount of meat for each burger ( I've found that a little less than 1/2 pound per burger works best) the sky is the limit on what you can create! Well received by all!
customer_reviews.author: JSI

customer_reviews.title: Quick and delicious
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. We made blue cheese stuffed burgers and they were amazing. It was so simple and quick and the burgers were big.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to load a hamburger
customer_reviews.text: I like the way you load the hamburger into it , press the form then load the cheese or what ever you want to load inside your hamburger. Then you just simply press the top hamburger on and seal you burger and your ready for the grill. Very easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I've not made stuffed burgers yet and won't very often but the burger press itself works great and is easy to use. So far, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jaegers

customer_reviews.title: Take your burger game to the next level!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic!! It is a high quality burger press. It is very durable, easy to use and easy to clean. Anyone who wants to try making stuffed burgers should definitely select the Grillaholics Stuffed Burger Press. They even sent an email after my purchase which contained a free recipe pdf.
customer_reviews.author: Jago

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He has used it three times now to make cheese stuffed burgers, and he absolutely loves it! He said it is incredibly easy to use, and even easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Make Your Own!
customer_reviews.text: You can buy stuffed burgers at the grocery store, or make your own! My husband has been having a GREAT time trying out new 'stuffings', and we often even find we don't use a bun or condiments because they're SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful

customer_reviews.title: Sticks and humongous burgers
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in how this worked. The insert is very hard to remove each time, and the meat sticks when you try and lift the press out. The burgers are huge.... no way to make smaller (less thick) burgers and have the process work.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Hamburgers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy a good hamburger now and then and that is why I grind my own meat. We like them big and juicy and charbroiled which may not be healthy for us but we don't make it a steady diet. I saw this burger press and got it for my husband at Christmas because I always get him something for his grill, he is definitely a grillaholic and I like it that way. Less work for me. He has used it a couple of times and really likes being able to stuff our burgers with hot peppers, cheese, onion, relishes, whatever we like. It has been a fun toy for him and I enjoy the end results.
customer_reviews.author: MRK

customer_reviews.title: looks great, appreciate the links to the recipes
customer_reviews.text: Well, I keep getting emails to review the product. I have already replied...but since you keep asking and pestering me for it...here it is again: I came, looks great, appreciate the links to the recipes. Came as fast as promised and packaged nice and neat. I have not use it yet. But will eventually. We good? is this a good enough review for now? I got lots of stuff to do. I gave you 5 stars, you can stop bugging me now. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product ! If you want to lean the tricks to using this to its full potential check it the YouTube video . My only knock on this product is not enough info . Should have indicated the nice video they did on YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Grillaholics stuffed burger press
customer_reviews.text: Very nice burger press, definitely enjoying experimenting with the stuffed burgers so many possibilities. Takes a little practice figuring out the right amount of ground beef to use. Also strongly recommend using wax paper when pressing burgers otherwise it tends to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Secondchance82

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Makes a good burger patty, but not ideal for making stuffed burgers. If stuffed burgers is what you are going for, look for a different product
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty product. Great for making stuffed burgers or just forming the perfect patties!
customer_reviews.text: When you live with a gadget freak like me-- you run out of ideas for gifts. Well this ended up being a great little gift. And stuffed burgers?? Well how could you go wrong! Sometimes, I just use this for the burger press/former without stuffing...it makes great sized burgers that never seem to shrink up when grilling. The best stuffed burgers yet have had crumbled bacon and cheese and grilled...topped with fried onions and drizzled with BBQ sauce...OML. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love the burgers it makes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son-in-law as he does most of the BBQs. The family absolutely loves it. They've been making all sorts of burgers with different fillings.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Looks like just what the cook ordered !!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this burger maker 5 stars in antifreeze a great experience with it and based on the reviews which compelled me to purchase this particular item. It appears to be well made and I am certain it will enable me to make great burgers both stuffed and plain. I look forward to using it soon!!
customer_reviews.author: BobBert

customer_reviews.title: bacon alright that's enough press works really good will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Oh man I'm grilling everyday tryin out all kinds a recipes with this burger press from juicy lucy to busty juicy tasty reggae burger. a little hint on the ingredients. Red Green Yellow peppers, sauce, bacon alright that's enough press works really good will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This gadget put me on the map!
customer_reviews.text: This gadget put me on the map! I was excited to use my Grillaholics burger press because the commercials were so exciting. I prepared to make the ultimate Jucy Lucy. When the shipment arrived, I was ready. I watched the video. I learned how to stuff a burger. Then, I created the best burger I had ever eaten! This tool put me on the map.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: I am im-"pressed" with this burger press.
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought one of these long ago.What makes it better than the others available is the removable bottom plate. I can't imagine trying to get a burger out of a press with out a removable bottom plate. Sturdy plastic and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: big moose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Worked as advertised, and though I experienced some slight issues with the meat sticking to the press, I believe that can be remedied by keeping the meat cold throughout the process. Made several different kinds of burgers for guests, to universal praise. I can honestly say these were the best burgers I've ever made. Use high quality, high-fat content ground chuck for best results, and I think it helps to pre-cook your stuffing materials (aside from the cheese obviously). Would absolutely recommend this product. Also makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Neil J. Vendetti

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was nonstick
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this...when using lean ground Turkey it sticks so much it's not worth the hassle. We greased it after each patty and still had a difficult time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great prep tool
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time this past Saturday. It worked as they said it would. The burgers were a perfect size, shape, and the stuffing was sealed in. I will be trying some of the recipes offered in the very near future. Great tool! Walt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were wider in diameter
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to use and clean. I wish it had a wider diameter because the burgers end up a little too thick and small for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The burgers made from this gizmo are amazing!!! Mouth watering. .. chili, cheese, onions, mushroom/rice.. your imagination for what goes in the middle is only limited to your imagination ... ENJOY!!
customer_reviews.author: kyle holt

customer_reviews.title: Gift - Feedback Was Positive
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone, so I can't give personal feedback, but gift recipient stated that it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: It was replaced immediately and I am very happy with the company
customer_reviews.text: The first shipping got lost in the mail. It was replaced immediately and I am very happy with the company! I haven't had a chance to use the hamburger press yet but I am very anxious to. The product looks very well made and easy to use. Great job Grillaholics!
customer_reviews.author: John k

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Functions great, I just wish it was a little larger. Cleans up easily in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Roetman

customer_reviews.title: Great stuffed burgers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The unit comes everything you need to make stuffed burgers. Perfect size for buns. You can make just patties if you want so they all come out the same. My favorite feature is the bottom pops out to help get your stuffed burgers out and for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Anson Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget for bbq addicts
customer_reviews.text: Super nice gadget for making stuffed burgers. Very easy to use and all burgers are even. The only problem we had after first time use is that the meat was sticking to the press when we removed it after making the filling hole, but not a deal breaker. I guess with practice you won't have this issue..
customer_reviews.author: Aimilia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much makes perfect sized burgers
customer_reviews.text: If you are just making regular ol patties this is a great burger press. I have only used it once so far but definitely good for that. I attempted to make 2 stuffed burgers not that they didn’t turn out well but not how I imagined...probably operator error though and the fact that it was first time. But happy with the purchase and definitely would recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Al S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: WOW! WOW!! WOW!!! This item is everything as described. Easy to use, easy to clean and the best way to make stuffed hamburger patties. All the stuffing stays inside when cooking because it is sealed. Would certainly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: DAR

customer_reviews.title: Easy Yummy Burgers
customer_reviews.text: I love this press. My burgers would fall apart cause I'm an amateur but now they come out perfect. Can't wait to try some of the recipes that were included.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuffed Burgers at a Low Price!
customer_reviews.text: This stuffed burger press is the simple and easy way to prepare delicious, stuffed hamburgers. And, the press is available at a great, low price. I just enjoyed a burger I made with the press today stuffed with pastrami and Swiss cheese. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Stanger 07

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stuffed burgers!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the hubs for Christmas, and it’s wonderful! Made lots of perfectly stuffed burgers with it, and clean up was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer King

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We used a neighbors stuffed burger maker before getting this one. The one our neighbor has was way too complicated! This was exactly what we were looking for and so very easy to use and also so very easy to clean. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time for making patties. Thick patties. Thin patties. And even stuffed patties. It does it all. Well made, easy to use, and easy to clean up. Just place in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well, and everyone enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: Good gift, but the instructions are a challenge. Had to YouTube how to use it initially. The burgers cooked up well and stuff it would definitely recommend as a novelty gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use and it works perfectly!! The easiest way to make stuffed burgers and you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: It's just me

customer_reviews.title: Could improve
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 people to figure this out. The directions are not clear. Once done they were good. Could be a little deeper pocket to stuff
customer_reviews.author: Danyielle Blueye

customer_reviews.title: You get what you expect. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present after wanting one for a while. We used it the next day on plain and stuffed burgers. It was everything I expected. Easy to use and clean, and produces consistent results.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Tollefsrud

customer_reviews.title: Search Is OVER!
customer_reviews.text: Great simple hamburger press. This is the best press i've ever used .
customer_reviews.author: Genaro C. Quodala Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, very easy to use and  clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Easy to use, works exactly as advertised. High-quality plastic parts come apart for easy cleaning. Makes stuffed burgers very simple and fast.
customer_reviews.author: foghorn

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described with no issues. I wait till morning of get togethers and just sprays with olive oil and have no need for the paper separators.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. The indented part is kind of a pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. The indented part is kind of a pain to release from the main press, and once the cheese has been added, the press doesn't do a great job of further adding more meat to it. Otherwise, it make this process simpler and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing so much. Awesome design. Everything about it is perfect, and now my burgers are too. No more wonky patties here
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: but do a you tube search for some very good videoes -- overall very pleased with product -- only ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little trial & error before you figure out just right amount of meat to use for burgers -- taking the top off can be a little messy ( use paper tower to hold on to bottom section while yo rotate top ) -- instruction that come with it are not very clear , but do a you tube search for some very good videoes -- overall very pleased with product -- only used it once but worked great
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. I really like it for making stuffed burgers.
customer_reviews.author: goosedowner

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep meat from getting stuck, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Like headline says, its tough to get meat to stay where it has to and not stick to the inserted piece. Even after, the "crater" it creates doesn't look great
customer_reviews.author: The B

customer_reviews.title: Well-formed burgers
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little bigger for full size buns, but it definitely forms the burger correct every time and is easy to slide out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stehno

customer_reviews.title: great product the part you form the burger in is ...
customer_reviews.text: great product the part you form the burger in is not one piece. the bottom plate that you form the burgers in, is seperated, so you can just push the finished product out. the others would stick to the plastic, and you had to pull out the burger with your fingers. Which ruins the shape of the burger.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great time saver! Burgers are uniform size on the grill and do not fall apart. You are still able to "stuff"them before placing the top layer of hamburger in the burger press. Perfect size burger!
customer_reviews.author: H82bl8

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5...
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. I love big burgers, but I can't make them myself. Mom is the best at making them, however, if you use this, get the slider buns. Any other bun will be too big for the burgers once they cook down. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This makes a very cool burger with stuffing in the middle! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: David  Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect burger every time
customer_reviews.text: High quality, heavy utensil, same perfect burger every time!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Royer

customer_reviews.title: Nice burger tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a unique item. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Lightman28

customer_reviews.title: Great for making burgers
customer_reviews.text: Easy device to make some pretty tasty and different burgers. We use ours quite often, and if you try it, you will too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Grillaholics Stuffed Burger Press and Recipe eBook - Extended Warranty - Hamburger Patty Maker for Grilling - BBQ Grill Accessories
feature_bullets: THE PROFESSIONAL DIFFERENCE – The name says it all: Grillaholics. We’re addicted to this stuff! Being the master grillers that we are, we bring you a durable, professional, commercial grade burger press that makes perfect round burgers like a machine! You also get our Stuffed Burger Recipe ebook FREE with your order.
A JACK OF ALL TRADES – Our burger press is the perfect companion for your home kitchen. Make patties or stuffed burgers with ease. Cook them indoor in a pan or outdoor on your grill!
SUPREME CLEAN - No matter how many delicious stuffed burgers you make with your burger press, clean up is easy with our dishwasher safe press.
PREMIUM MATERIALS - Made of heavy duty durable BPA-free nonstick plastic material so you can make burger patties instead of a mess.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE – Every set we sell is backed by a full 100% MONEY BACK LIFETIME GUARANTEE!! If our product isn’t for you, just send it back our way, and we’ll make it right.
